law.text: The purpose of this subtitle is to establish minimum standards for liability self-insurance groups to assure that such groups are providing adequate coverage for professional or public liability risks. Except as specifically provided in this subtitle no other provision of KRS Chapter 304 shall apply to liability self-insurance groups.
law.history: Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 358, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1994.
